data.eml:eml: Cyrtodactylus dumnuii (Squamata: Gekkonidae), a new cave-dwelling gecko from Chiang Mai Province, Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bauer, Aaron M., Kunya, Kirati, Sumontha, Montri, Niyomwan, Piyawan, Pauwels, Olivier S. G., Chanhome, Lawan, Kunya, Tunyakorn (2010): Cyrtodactylus dumnuii (Squamata: Gekkonidae), a new cave-dwelling gecko from Chiang Mai Province, Thailand. Zootaxa 2570: 41-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197372
